register.authentication_signup_label:
The verification code was sent to the email for signup.
After checking your email, proceed with authentication
register.authentication_recover_label:
The verification code was sent to the email for recovering password 
After checking your email, proceed with authentication

account_check.login_request: Sign in with the changed password

lock_account.lockdown_text:
Your account has been protected after 5 failed login attempts..
Enter the verification code sent to your account email address.
lock_account.resending_code_mail_label: Didn't you ever receive an email?

messages:.authentication_code_do_not_match: The authentication code does not match.
messages:.password_too_short: Password must be at least '%{password_minimum_length}' digits.
messages:.simple_password: Password must include both English and number
messages:.incorrect_password_warning:
If 5 times fail, your account will be locked
Additional authentication is required.

kyc.start_kyc_step1: Take a picture of your ID
kyc.start_kyc_step3: Taking a selfie with your ID card
kyc.kyc_step1_text: It should be taken with the ID you chose in the next step.
kyc.kyc_step3_text: Self-authentication photos must be clearly taken without blurring or compositing
kyc.kyc_step3_desc1: Take a selfie with the ID taken in step 2
kyc.kyc_step3_desc2: The contents of step 2 and the contents of the ID must be the same.
kyc.kyc_step3_complete_text: Was the selfie picture clearly taken without blurring or compositing?
